Class HelloController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project2scenebuilder.HelloController
public class HelloController extends Object
Controls all functionality for the ordering UI including placing orders, clearing orders, and adding new items.

    • addNewSeasonalItem

      public boolean addNewSeasonalItem(String itemName, String[] invList, String itemType)
      Adds a new seasonal item to the database and associates it with the specified inventory list.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the new seasonal item to be added.
      invList - An array of ingredient names that comprise the inventory list for the new item.
      itemType - The type of the new seasonal item (e.g., "entree", "drink", "side", "appetizer").
      Returns:
      boolean if the item was added successfully then returns true. If unsuccessful, return false.
